website_summaries.verdict: Vibram took a gamble by discontinuing their hugely popular Treksport and welcomed the FiveFingers Trek Ascent. Based on the feedback, generally, most runners were even more impressed by the new model because of its comfortable, versatile, and barefoot ride with just enough cushioning and protection for long-distance runs. The shoe is designed for summer days as it is breathable and the traction is insane. It is easily one of the most sought-after shoes in Vibram’s list of toe shoes.
pros: Most reviewers deeply valued the comfortable feel and fit of the Vibram FiveFingers Trek Ascent
Some runners consider the Trek Ascent is a good value investment
Runners appreciated the not-so-aggressive outsole as it allowed them to easily traverse both flat and rugged terrains
Several runners used the shoe for other activities like hiking, gym sessions, and other off-road adventures
A few expert reviewers noted that this shoe was efficient during long-distance running sessions
A moderate number of users consider the looks as the sleekest and most sophisticated among all Vibram shoes
The fabric dries in no time, based on the comments of a handful of reviewers
The black color allowed a moderate number of runners to wear the shoe without getting strange looks from other people
The traction given by the outsole unit received positive remarks for being efficient
The lightweight and flexible form of this shoe generated great feedback from runners
It’s easy to clean, remarked several consumers
Some runners loved the Vibram Trek Ascent’s breathable upper
cons: A number of testers complained that the FiveFingers Trek Ascent had a tendency to stink
A few runners observed that it did not have the same ground feedback as the other truly minimalist shoes
A handful of people experienced some blistering because the cuff apparently rubbed against their skin
Some consumers noted that the upper fabrics and the thin sole unit broke apart after a few uses

customer_reviews.title: Comfort without comparison
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love Fivefingers, easily the most comfortable footwear I've ever had, this is my second pair. Perfect for everyday life, ignoring the funny looks you get, and for more energetic activity (walking, running, climbing etc.) Would suggest that everyone try a pair at some point.
customer_reviews.author: Karl Bulmer

customer_reviews.title: I’m in love
customer_reviews.text: These Vibram are awesome, so comfortable, I’m just getting into bf running so this is my first try out in Vibram fivefingers, wish I’d tried them sooner, amazing! I’m between a 9 and a 9 and a half depending on the shoe, so ordered a 9 and a half in these, but I think a 9 would have been a better fit, however I haven’t worn them with socks so they maybe spot on in the winter.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic shoes. So comfortable. Good to run in. I like the thicker sole - having shoes with zero heel lift ('natural style' running shoes) shouldn't mean you have to feel every pebble underfoot. I also have some Bikila WP, also great shoes and great for winter, but I think the trek ascent are more comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Dr Bob

customer_reviews.title: sizing
customer_reviews.text: as Amazon sizing chart they differ from vibrams the item I order as per Amazon's was ment to be the correct size how ever they were to small as per vibrams. check vibrams size chart before ordering to ensure you get the correct size.
customer_reviews.author: Col

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I'm really happy with these. They are my second paid of five fingers. I wear them outdoors for gentle hikes. They have good grip and are surprisingly warm. I'm generally an EU44, but the EU 45 (11-11.5) fit me great.
customer_reviews.author: cluefunk

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Really like this product - arrived promptly. Buy a size smaller than your normal shoe size I would say, especially if you are planning on wearing barefoot.
customer_reviews.author: Mr C J P

customer_reviews.title: Good fit, great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son who is a personal trainer. He loves them. Took a day or two to get used to wearing them, he bought the special socks to wear with them. Wears them whilst training and is very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Brooks

customer_reviews.title: I AM the technology
customer_reviews.text: Yes these fit. I have V running that fit like a.. er... glove but are 43, these I had to send back a 43 as they came up small, the 44 is fine. Got these for the colder days. Only downside to Fivefingers is I dont really want to run in anything else now.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Warman

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable. The grip on these babys is fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Used them fore a long walk. Very comfortable. The grip on these babys is fantastic. I went for size 8.5-9 uk size and they are a perfect fit. I update review when I run in them.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money great everyday barefoot alternative shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Just as I expected great shoe, five fingers for me are the best barefoot alternative for everyday use, plus they are probably the most robust brand. Also you don't have to spend a fortune to experience natural movement these are definitely recommended as the lower cost option for this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Charles X

customer_reviews.title: Your best foot is barefoot
customer_reviews.text: A great product by Vibram fits as stated even with socks. The material and sole are of high quality, robust yet flexible which makes for an excellent outdoor running shoe as well as indoor training. They provide excellent grip, comfort and durability in both training areas would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: New to Barefoot running
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are a bit difficult to put on. Cut on the back of my achilles when wearing for the first time training on a grass surface. Need to wear suitable socks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for what i need!
customer_reviews.text: I was after these for taking kettlebell & circuit sessions to improve the small stability muscles in the ankle. They are great..i wouldnt use them yet for running until you have altered technique of toe to heel & not heel to toe. Really nice & tidy & the support on the inside of the anrch is there but not intrusive.
customer_reviews.author: W. Ford

customer_reviews.title: i am 80% happy but that might change to 100% in time
customer_reviews.text: Still getting to know them, the toe area is quite wide that will suit somebody who has wide feet.i also thought they would rub on the inside of my toes but they don’t.i am 80% happy but that might change to 100% in time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You found it!
customer_reviews.text: Super fast delivery! The Trek Ascent are by far the best Vibram's. Out of the six different pairs I own, these are my go to ones! Comfortable with incredible levels of grip (incredible!). Great for running!
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Good brand , that represents quality & built to last
customer_reviews.text: Excellent and durable : still running with it after 4 years
customer_reviews.author: SunShine

customer_reviews.title: Game changer
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these. They're quite difficult to get used to. But that first bit of discomfort after switching from normal trainers is worth it. I've seen great improvement in my posture, leg strength, and overall fitness. I found them so comfortable I wear them even when I'm not training.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, out of 4 pairs already owned these are the best yet
customer_reviews.author: Chris Davey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesoeme shows but make sure you keep to short distances until you are accustomed to them
customer_reviews.author: K. K

customer_reviews.title: Check the Vibram website to see how to measure your feet for correct shoe size
customer_reviews.text: This is a comfortable shoe with a durable sole, if you are new to Vibram FiveFingers I would recommend starting with the Trek Ascent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So nice
customer_reviews.text: First fivefingers shoes, and they do not disappoint. Perhaps get half a size smaller to get a snug fit, but not really an issue for me
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Was nervous about buying these, as they're not cheap. However I love them, so comfortable. These are awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Rilla7

customer_reviews.title: Made my kids laugh at me , then they bought them so comfy
customer_reviews.text: Great so comfortable made my kids laugh, but then they bought them.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good grip but slightly too big. Still feel snug with the laces though.
customer_reviews.author: Joe A

customer_reviews.title: Love them can't wait until my next pair
customer_reviews.text: Been wearing vibrum five fingers for a while now. Love them can't wait until my next pair.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Dorgan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fit very well. Once on you forget your wearing them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad for running and balls of your feet compared with other vibrams i have tried.
customer_reviews.text: Really bad for running you end up putting too much weight on the balls of your feet. Never had this problem with the two other vibrams i have run a lot with.
customer_reviews.author: Zena Al-Saadi

customer_reviews.title: I bought this to practice Tai chi as well as ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to practice Tai chi as well as try it for running. It gives an interesting feeling and it is definitly an interesting shoe concept, i will probably buy another pair in a few months if this feeling remains.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel M

customer_reviews.title: Extremely comfortable quirky trainer
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my partner for Valentine's and he was over the moon , he said there so comfortable and he's buying another pair , so I think I did good .
customer_reviews.author: stacie

customer_reviews.title: DELACACY COMBINED WITH LUXURY*
customer_reviews.text: A very happy customer. Taking much pride wearing these were ever i travel! Qaulity of the Vibrams are of top level and design
customer_reviews.author: Philip North

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Better fit than Bikila Evo's 1 size smaller. Enough awareness of the ground while protecting against sharp stones
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Weird. Kinda like barefoot but not. I love them.
customer_reviews.text: Weird. Kinda like barefoot but not. I love them. Great styling.
customer_reviews.author: WestLondonAmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: 10 out of 10
customer_reviews.text: Spot on, couldn't of asked for a better quality purchase
customer_reviews.author: JAY

customer_reviews.title: Fit well and so glad I went a size smaller fell funny a first ...
customer_reviews.text: Fit well and so glad I went a size smaller fell funny a first but after a while you feel free
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love them best pair I have.
customer_reviews.text: This is my 4th pair of Fivefingers and these are my favourite of the 4. I have different styles and these are great to use on and off road. I was a bit worried over having the orange but wow I love them. Size wish I find a little more space around my foot but not the toes. I think if I ordered a smaller then would find it to tight around toes. Arrived fast and packaged well....5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Primal/Paleo Man

customer_reviews.title: 5 10 I just re ordered in a 8 there was a good inc and half gap at heel But other than ...
customer_reviews.text: Buy way smaller than you need I am usually a 9.5 10 I just re ordered in a 8 there was a good inc and half gap at heel But other than that a very good and comfy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy Days!
customer_reviews.text: Great, comfy fit, size as expected. Take a bit of getting used to, but really pleased. Good fast service from Sportshoes.
customer_reviews.author: fiestasdearte

product_meta.title: Vibram FiveFingers Men's Trek Ascent Multisport Outdoor Shoes
product_meta.description: For off-road aventures and Hiking in all conditions, the Trek Ascent offers a cushy soft 4mm Polyurethane insole for a comfortable yet connected feel
feature_bullets: Optimal balance of stability and flexibility for ground adaptation
